title: 1970 Das Atem des Schafes und Das Meer ist unendlich schön (the breath of the sheep and the see is endless beautiful)

sources.title: 1970 Das Atem des Schafes und Das Meer ist unendlich schön (the breath of the sheep and the see is endless beautiful)
sources.description: The sea is infinitely beautiful Description of a film installation with 5 projectors on 3 walls. The breath of the sheep 9,35’ N8 mm Tour trough Scotland with Gotthard Graubner and Günter Uecker.
